text: Ethel's Romeos is a 1915 American short comedy film featuring Oliver Hardy. ==Cast== * Fayette Perry - Ethel * Bud Ross - Charlie * Edward Boulden - Albert * Herbert Stanley - Frank * Madge Orlamond - Miss Stimpson * Oliver Hardy - Jake Stimpson (as Babe Hardy) ==See also== * List of American films of 1915 * Oliver Hardy filmography ==References== ==External links== * Category:1915 films Category:1915 comedy films Category:1915 short films Category:American silent short films Category:American films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American comedy films Category:Comedy short films Category:Films directed by Edwin Middleton
title: Ethel's Romeos
